item.title: Karma
item.description: Introduction As the famous philosopher Justin Timberlake once said: What Goes Around… Comes Around

item.title: About
item.description: Introduction As with all things these days I posed a question to Perplexity AI about myself: who is Athul Muralidhar ? this is what came out: Athul Muralidhar Athul Muralidhar is a multidisciplinary software developer and physicist currently based in Amsterdam, Netherlands. He has a diverse background in software development, physics, and entrepreneurship. Professional Background Founder of Antai-nl: Athul founded Antai-nl, a nonprofit organization focused on adversarial attacks to challenge machine learning systems.
